name: peter show
description:
you play as sun,a child that doesn't have lot of friends and could use a little company.little did she know.Peter show enter her dimension and offer her if she answer his quiz and survive his deadly game show she will earn her new best friend forever will she be able to do it or be stuck in the void forever

controls :

mouse : for decisions and button

left key : left

right key : right 

up key : Jump

if you using android device you could use only your finger but it will be extremely hard tell if you do it
